snippet: Gabrielle Giffords, the former Democratic congresswoman from Arizona, is settling into the third act of her public life as she shifts to dedicate her career to reducing gun violence.
abstract: Gabrielle Giffords, former Democratic congresswoman from Arizona, is settling into third act of her public life as she dedicates herself to reducing gun violence; Giffords is face and emotional dynamism behind new advocacy group and separate political action committee dedicated to issue.
lead_paragraph: Gabrielle Giffords, the former Democratic congresswoman from Arizona, is settling into the third act of her public life as she shifts to dedicate her career to reducing gun violence.

headline.seo: Gabrielle Giffords Prepares to Fight Gun Violence
headline.main: Giffords Eases Steadily Into New Life, and Cause
headline.print_headline: Giffords Eases Steadily Into New Life, and Cause
